name: Pirates: Hunt for Blackbeard's Booty
overview: Live the pirate life and play pirate-themed activities with your friends. The game features fun pirate characters, treasure collection, and the ultimate customization of your characters and games Features • Over 20 fun-filled pirate activities - Sword fight from the deck of your mighty pirate ship, sail the winds of the wavy seas, dig up buried treasure chests, and play some recreational pirate mini-golf • Multi-player Pirate-mono-Pirate Action! Choose from 5 different environments, each with 5 activities ranging from team-based to player-vs-player competition • Win gold pieces for your efforts - collect over 80 pieces of assorted treasures and use them to customize your character and games. Buy swords, new boats or new outfits for your characters • 3 modes of gameplay - Play in adventure mode, Olympics Mode or Master Series Mode
